fullText: Under Neil Pepe's direction, the production feels stagnant and lifeless, failing to capture the raw energy and desperation that makes Mamet's work so compelling.
dtliExcerpt: Under Neil Pepe's direction, the production feels stagnant and lifeless, failing to capture the raw energy and desperation that makes Mamet's work so compelling.
